item.title: Report X-2024061289
item.description:

  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE LEAKING CLASS 8 HAZMAT WAS RESPONDED TO BY RESPONDER, THE PACKAGE WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. ALL MERCHANDISE WAS AFFECTED BY THE SPILL. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024061445
item.description:
Report X-2024061445

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-14
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND IN THE EAST UNLOAD WHERE CALL WAS MADE TO PSC FOR CLEAN UP. RESPONDER WENT TO DOOR 35 FOLLOWED SMALL PACKAGE DECISION TREE AND DONNED PPE. RESPONDER CLEANED UP SPILL AND BROUGHT PACKAGE AND DEBRIS BACK TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. RESPONDER DISCOVERED UNDECLARED OXIDIZING LIQUID N.O.S AND CORROSIVE LIQUIDS N.O.S.
